step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood assembly.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Raise vehicle and support axle as needed.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbocharger if applicable.
Disconnect exhaust hanger from frame and secure exhaust system out of way if applicable.
Close fuel valves and remove cross-over hose and bracket if applicable.
Drain automatic transmission fluid into suitable container.
Remove drive shaft from behind main transmission.
Disconnect transmission wiring harness as needed to remove transmission.
Disconnect parking brake lever cable from transmission if applicable.
Disconnect shift select cable assembly from transmission, include p-clips.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines and battery cables from bell housing.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from transmission. Cap ends.
Remove transmission oil dipstick tube.
Remove starter motor, include disconnect wiring.
Remove flywheel inspection plate from flywheel housing.
Remove torque converter bolts.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine EXCEPT 2.
Secure tranmission jack to transmission.
Remove automatic transmission assembly, include remove remaining bolts.
Remove automatic transmission assembly from under vehicle as needed.
Position automatic transmission assembly under vehicle.
Install automatic transmission assembly to engine.
Install bolts retaining transmission to engine.
Remove and return transmission jack.
Install torque converter bolts.
Install flywheel inspection plate.
Install starter, include connect wiring.
Install transmission oil dipstick tube.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to transmission.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines and battery cables to bell housing.
Connect shift select cable assembly to transmission, include p-clips.
Connect parking brake lever cable to transmission if applicable.
Connect transmission wiring harness.
Install drive shaft to transmission. Torque to spec.
Lower vehicle as needed.
Connect exhaust hangers to frame rail. Connect exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger.
Install fuel cross-over bracket and hose. Open valves if applicable.
Connect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Fill automatic transmission assembly with fluid.
Start engine assembly.
Top Off automatic transmission fluid as needed.
Close hood assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
